Package jchain.bc

Class Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.bc.Header
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hashable
    public class Header
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hashable
    Represents a block header in a blockchain system.

    • Field Summary

      static int VERSION_NUMBER  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Header​(java.lang.String prevBlockHash, java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList)
      Returns an instance of a block header constructed from the previous block hash and the transactions list.
